action.action-desc: Mrs. Miller-Meeks (for herself and Mr. Krishnamoorthi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 to clarify a provision relating to certain contents of registrations under that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Disclosing Foreign Influence in Lobbying Act.
Section 4(b) of the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (2 U.S.C. 1603(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (6), by striking and at the end; and
in paragraph (7), by striking the offense. and inserting the following:

notwithstanding paragraph (4), the name and address of each government of a foreign country (including any agency or subdivision of a government of a foreign country, such as a regional or municipal unit of government) and foreign political party, other than the client, that participates in the direction, planning, supervision, or control of any lobbying activities of the registrant.
